project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays the final score at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored within the code.

task.name: Implement the main game loop that asks questions and gets user input
Store multiple-choice questions and corresponding answers in a variable
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Display the final score after all questions have been answered
Write tests for all implemented game features, including question handling and score calculation
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
